Task:
Identify essential genes from this focused high-scoring dataset.

This dataset contains the top 1000 highest-scoring genes from the full screen.
Scores range from 0.411 to 1.000 (all high-scoring).

STRATEGY: Since all genes here have relatively high scores, look for:
1. The highest scoring genes (closest to 1.000)
2. Genes that score well above the mean (0.469)
3. Patterns in gene IDs that correlate with importance

Top examples: GENE_9491, GENE_10303, GENE_15048, GENE_10304, GENE_15049, GENE_17688, GENE_10302, GENE_17665, GENE_17662, GENE_17654
Measurement: Gene importance score (0.411 to 1.000). All genes are pre-selected high scorers.
